songs.title: Sober
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics will be available upon release. Stay tuned

Snippet
Sober, when you come closer
Boy I know I know you've been trying to quit
But you let it show

[...]

Boy we're kissing now
Baby when I'm with you
I'm wasted

[...]

Sober, when you come closer
Boy I know I know you've been trying to quit
But you let it show
